glowing.name: Glowing
description: All players are given the glowing effect once the border stops shrinking.
This means that they can be seen through walls even if they are not crouching.

normalized_mob_cap.name: Normalized Mob Cap
description: Adjusts the vanilla mob spawning algorithm to ensure that mobs spawn at the same rate regardless of how close they are to the border
By default, mobs are more likely to spawn near to border.
